  "Allegations" : "THE CUSTOMERS OPENED UP A PRDENTIAL SECURITIES ACCOUNT IN FEBRUARY 2000.  THE CLAIMANT  WAS A SOPHISTICATED INVESTOR WITH OVER FIVE YEARS EXPERIENCE AND WAS INTERESTED IN BUY-WRITE STOCK OPTION STRATEGY.  AT THE TIME, I WAS IN A PARTNERSHIP WITH AN EXPERIENCED FINANCIAL ADVISOR (WOODY SOEMANTORO)  WHO HAD EIGHT YEARS EXPERIENCE AND SPECIALIZED IN OPTIONS.  AS A JUNIOR BROKER, MY MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES WERE TO PROSPECT FOR NEW BUSINESS, SCHEDULE APPOINTMENTS, AND MAKE MUTUAL FUND RECOMMENDATIONS.  MY PARTNER, WOODY SOEMANTORO, MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES WRE TO CONDUCT MEETINGS WITH PROSPECTS AND CLIENTS, PROVIDE THE MEANS TO HELP MANAGE ESTATE AND INCOME TAXES, AND ONGOING OVERSIGHT AND MONITORING OF INVESTMENTS (STOCKS/OPTIONS).  AN APPOINTMENT WAS CONDUCTED AT THE PRUDENTIAL SECURITIES OFFICE IN DOWNTOWN DENVER TO DETERMINE THE GOALS AND SUITABILITY OF THE CLAIMANT. THE MEETING CONCLUDED WITH THE CLAIMANT AND THE FINANCIAL REPRESENTATIVES UNDERSTANDING THE PURPOSE FOR THE ACCOUNT.  THE CLAIMANT AND MY PARTNER AGREED ON HOW THE ACCOUNT WAS TO BE HANDLED.  THE CLAIMANT WOULD BE DIRECTLY IN CONTACT ON A CONTINUOUS BASIS WITH THE FINANCIAL ADVISOR (WOODY SOEMANTORO). I HAD NO DIRECT INVOLVEMENT WITH THE CLAIMANT'S ACCOUNT.  I HAVE CONTACTED AND LEFT VOICE MESSAGES WITH PRUDENTIAL SECURITIES CONCERNING THIS IMPORTANT MATTER.  PRUDENTIAL SECURITIES HAS NOT RESPONDED TO ANY OF MY REQUESTS.  MY PARTNER LEFT PRUDENTIAL SECURITIES AND THE FINANCIAL SECURITIES INDUSTRY IN JANUARY 2001.  I HAVE NOT HAD ANY DIRECT CONTACT WITH HIM SINCE HE HAS LEFT.  THE INFORMATION GIVEN IS TO THE BEST OF MY KNOWLEDGE CONCERNING THIS MATTER.",
